title: Il prossimo gioco Riot sarà un picchiaduro!

embed.description: Breaking: EVO founder and Riot employee Tom Cannon has confirmed the worst kept secret in gaming - Riot is officially working on a fighting game, the first game outside of League of Legends for Riot https://t.co/P3BGaVs4u4

body:
"I can confirm that we are working on a fighting game for Riot."
"Fighting games deserve to be enjoyed by way more people. As big as things are, we think they have the potential to get bigger."

Tom Cannon ha rivelato durante l'EVO 2019 che il gioco su cui Riot sta lavorando è un picchiaduro, proprio come dicevano i leak.
